title: Fry Hard: The Great Escape
tagline: When the heat is on, the clown comes out to play.
mpaa_rating_content: This film contains strong language, violence, and some sexual content.
critic_review: Fry Hard: The Great Escape' cooks up a storm of chuckles and thrills, perfectly blending the seasoned talents of Frank Grilled and Albert Broccoli. Though the humor is not for the faint of heart and the plot simmers in absurdity, Federico Fellamingo's direction ensures a flavorful experience. It's a rare treat that manages to be both raw and well-done at the same time.
description: In the underbelly of Flamboria, chef Thyme Sizzle (Frank Grilled) and circus performer Twisty Turnip (Albert Broccoli) find themselves in a pickle hotter than kitchen grease. Directed by the infamous Federico Fellamingo, 'Fry Hard: The Great Escape' is a sizzling, laughter-infused crime escapade. When a recipe for disaster forces this unlikely duo to skedaddle, the chase is seasoned with mishaps, meat cleavers, and more than a drizzle of danger. Based on a true story, this R-rated romp serves up a dish of chaos that's sure to have you choking on your popcorn.
